|cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM FA526 |cpu1_type_rev = ECONA |cpu1spd = |cpu2chip1 = Star;STR9109; |cpu2_cores = |cpu2_type = |cpu2_type_rev = |cpu2spd = |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = |flash1size = |flash1maxsize = |flash2type = |fla2_num = |fla2chip = |flash2size = |flash2maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = |ram2type = |ram2type1 = |ram2spd = |ram2size = 32 |ram2chip = Nanya;; |ram2_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Star;STR9109; |sw1chip = Vitesse;VSC7385; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:1C:10 |oui = 00:1C:10 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = Mini PCI |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/22/2007 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8361P; |rad1chip2 = Marvell;88W8060; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The STR9109 appears to handle the WLAN while the STR9202 handles the Ethernet interfaces. Per [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=9211 this thread on the OpenWrt forums], the STR9109 has access to 32MB RAM and the STR9202 has access to 64MB RAM. The wireless module is a SerComm device, board ID YBW10A-1.0MM. The manual on the Cisco-Linksys site says the default SSID is 'ciscosb'. The manual in the FCC documents says the default SSID is 'linksys-n'. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/routers/csbr/wrvs4400n/administration/guide/WRVS4400N_AG_OL-20048.pdf Administration guide] [http://www.hydrogenaudio.org/forums/index.php?showtopic=58720 Shell access on the WRVS4400N] (linked from [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=22577 here on the DD-WRT forums])
[http://homecommunity.cisco.com/t5/Wireless-Routers/stable-Firmware-for-WRVS4400N-with-working-IPv6/td-p/279867 'stable Firmware for WRVS4400N with working IPv6' on the Linksys forums] links to the firmware [http://www.tytec.de/Project4.htm here] [[Category:English Documentation]]
